content.rendered:
Henrico Too Smart 2 Start Coalition

Focused on Youth Substance Use Prevention

Discover More About Our Social Media Contest
Learn more
RULES & TIPS

About HTS2S

Assisting the Youth never doubt that they are Valuable & Powerful

HTS2S facilitates events and courses that provides families with information and skills, advocate for policy and procedure changes, provides incentives to youth, as well as promote and support community resources in order to promote youth substance use prevention.

Learn MORE

HTS2S Goals

ADVOCACY
Promote legislation to reduce youth's access to substances
Leran More
COMMUNITY COLLABORATION
Increase community collaboration to strengthen initiatives
Leran More
AWARENESS
Raise awareness to reduce youth use in Henrico County
Learn More
SUSTAINABILITY
Ensure sustainability of Henrico Too Smart 2 Start coalition initiatives
Learn more
Come join us

We need to reshape our own perception of how we view ourselves and the community. We have to step up and take the lead.

Become a volunteer/member
events

We organize inclusive events for Henrico Community

View our upcoming Events
Click here

News Feed
Education

Empowering Youths to Cope with Stress Without Drugs: Building Resilience and Healthy Coping Skills

In today’s fast-paced and demanding world, youths often face a myriad of stressors, from academic pressures to social challenges. Unfortunately, some may turn to drugs as a temporary escape or coping mechanism, unaware of the

Read More »
August 5, 2023 No Comments
Education

The Dangers of Drug Abuse for Youths in America: Overcoming Misuse and Peer Pressure

Drug addiction among American kids remains a serious problem, with serious consequences that can have long-term consequences in their life. The appeal of experimentation, along with peer pressure, offers considerable obstacles for young people, predisposing

Read More »
July 26, 2023 No Comments
VIEW ALL
